description.value:
This staff is constructed from a magically grown amanita mushroom, with a shaft that spreads into a bright red cap speckled in white. While wielding the staff you gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Nature checks to identify fungus.

Activate Cast a Spell

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

  • Cantrip @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Puff of Poison]
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protector Tree] (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Plant or Fungus] (fungus only)
  • 2nd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protector Tree] (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Plant or Fungus] (fungus only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.One with Plants] (giant mushroom only)
  • 3rd @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Protector Tree] (resembles giant mushroom, not a tree), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Stinking Cloud], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Summon Plant or Fungus] (fungus only), @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wall of Thorns] (resembles wall of fungus; deals poison damage)

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.
